resources.string: Backup currently running kernel with modules. Modules are the one responsible for basic features working like WiFi. You can use this option when you backup frost for the first time.
Restore previously backed up kernel.Suggestion: Reboot after restore completes.
Restore previously backed up kernel with modules.Suggestion: Reboot after restore completes.
Toggle between Sim states. To avoid confusion when switch is ON Dual-Sim is ON, when switch is OFF Dual-Sim is OFF
You can switch between recoveries by placing your recovery image inside Internal storage/Frostbar/recovery.
Backup the current recovery that you are using.
Clicking on this option will delete all backup images.
